answer.text: The AGA26 Conference brings together researchers, academicians, and industry professionals to share the latest developments in algebraic geometry and applications. This is a premier event featuring keynote speakers, research presentations, and networking opportunities.

items.question: When and where will the conference take place?

answer.text: The conference will be held from March 15-18, 2024, at the University Convention Center. Detailed venue information and directions will be provided to registered participants.

items.question: How do I register for the conference?

answer.text: Registration is available online through our conference website. Early bird registration offers discounted rates and closes on February 1, 2024. Regular registration continues until March 10, 2024.
Registration fees vary by participant type:

items.question: Can I submit a paper or abstract?

answer.text: Yes! We welcome paper submissions and abstract presentations. The deadline for submissions is January 15, 2024. Please visit our Call for Papers section for detailed submission guidelines and requirements.
